title: Flipped Learning-Based Chatbot-Utilized Higher Language Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Targets learners with advanced expertise in language education domains who face time constraints as working professionals, designed around learning activities using personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can identify core concepts in the pre-learning phase of flipped learning with over 80% accuracy using a chatbot.
Learners enhance creative problem-solving skills required for language learning case analysis through interactions with a chatbot.
Learners demonstrate self-directed problem-solving skills for learning-related FAQs with over 70% proficiency using chatbot-based learning materials.

resources: IBM Watson or Similar AI Chatbot Platform

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
